1.summary: The review suggests providing additional intuition or analysis on the effectiveness of the self-adaptive expert combination formulation.
1.verbatim: - While the rationale for the self-adaptive combination is clear, it would be useful to provide some additional intuition or analysis on why this particular formulation is effective.

2.summary: The review notes a limitation in the evaluation, which focuses solely on autoregressive language models and suggests testing on other architectures like encoder-only models.
2.verbatim: - Evaluation focuses on autoregressive language models. It would be interesting to see if the benefits extend to other architectures like encoder-only models as well.
